news_title: BlackRock Files for Bitcoin Premium Income ETF Registration
news_subtitle: BlackRock submits S-1 with SEC for new iShares Bitcoin Premium Income ETF targeting premium yield and volatility. Read original article on aicryptocore.com

news_title: Japan FSA Begins Consultation on Crypto Regulatory Overhaul
news_subtitle: Japan's FSA opens a public consultation on new crypto rules, aiming for completion by 2026 and spot ETFs by 2028. Read original article on coincu.com
